'''Random selector''' is a technical [[feature]] that randomly chooses a feature from a list with chances.

== Data values ==
=== ID ===
{{ID table
|firstcolumnname=Feature type
|displayname=[No displayed name]
|nameid=random_selector
|foot=1
}}

=== Config ===
{{main|Configured feature}}
<section begin="config"/><div class="treeview">
* {{nbt|compound|config}}
** {{nbt|string}}{{nbt|compound|default}}: {{json ref|placed feature|inline=1}} &mdash; Used if none of the below features are chosen.
** {{nbt|list|features}}: (Required, but can be empty) A list of placed features from which to randomly choose.
*** {{nbt|compound}}: A feature and its corresponding chance.
**** {{nbt|string}}{{nbt|compound|feature}}: {{json ref|placed feature|inline=1}}
**** {{nbt|float|chance}}: The chance of this feature being chosen. Value between 0.0 and 1.0 (inclusive).
The defined features can either reference a placed feature directly, or can reference a configured feature by nesting another "feature" node within. For more information, see [[Random selector/Config/Example definitions|this page]] on the two allowed types of feature definitions.
</div><section end="config"/>

{{Collapse|title=An example|outerstyle=margin: 0.5rem 0|head=1}}
<syntaxhighlight lang="json">
{
  "type": "minecraft:random_selector",
  "config": {
    "default": {
      "feature": "minecraft:patch_grass_jungle",
      "placement": []
    },
    "features": [
      {
        "chance": 0.05,
        "feature": "minecraft:fancy_oak_checked"
      },
      {
        "chance": 0.15,
        "feature": "minecraft:jungle_bush"
      },
      {
        "chance": 0.7,
        "feature": "minecraft:mega_jungle_tree_checked"
      }
    ]
  }
}
</syntaxhighlight>
